name: TYRH
description: What is the project about? TYRH is a meme coin with utility on Pulsechain. Designed to burn one of the following coins: PLS, PLSX, HEX or INC with every purchase (22% of every buy). TYRH token holders can stake their TYRH tokens for 55 days to earn rewards. With a minimum 10K token stake of TYRH you will receive an airdrop of either Burn, Plant or Water token. TYRH stands for Thank You Richard Heart. What makes your project unique? Its the first tax token that burns 100% of the tax value. The ecosystem consists of many yielding options. A new style of GameFi History of your project. TYRH V1 was launched on 14th July 2023 TYRH V2 was launched on 22th July 2023 TYRH V3 was launched on 12th August 2023 Whatâ€™s next for your project? TYRH V4 What can your token be used for? TYRH can be used to burn other tokens or yield farm on other tokens. Holding TYRH is a proof of burn
